oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Buffalo Address Book and Family Directory 1883
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Containing the names of householders, with their residences and exact numbers; the names of adult members of each family; together with a complete classification of streets; personnel of the press; plans of theatres; members of the clubs, etc., Together with other information of local interest.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Peter Paul & Brother
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Address books (Buffalo, N.Y.); Directories (Buffalo, N.Y.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Buffalo Address Book and Family Directory

oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Buffalo Address Book and Family Directory

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Buffalo Address Book and Family Directory 1901
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An Address Book for social and business requirements, containing the names of householders and adult members of each family, an alphabetical arrangement of streets in the order of house numbers, cross streets in italics, an index of names, a church directory, personnel of the press, officers of clubs, societies, etc., diagrams of theatres, list of apartment houses, and shoppers' guide of know and reliable firms.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stoddard and Seward
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Address books (Buffalo, N.Y.); Directories (Buffalo, N.Y.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Buffalo Address Book and Family Directory

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Buffalo Address Book and Family Directory 1904-1905
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An Address Book for social and business requirements, containing the names of householders and adult members of each family, an alphabetical arrangement of streets in the order of house numbers, cross streets in italics, an index of names, a church directory, personnel of the press, officers and members of clubs, societies, etc., diagrams of theatres and list of apartment houses. The Buffalo Address Book and Family Directory will be reissued August, 1905.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Dwight J. Stoddard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Address books (Buffalo, N.Y.); Directories (Buffalo, N.Y.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Buffalo Address Book and Family Directory

oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Peter Paul & Son

oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Buffalo Address Book and Family Directory
